Plot: An FBI agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.
Title: Miss Congeniality
Writer: Marc Lawrence, Katie Ford, Caryn Lucas
Actors: Sandra Bullock, Michael Caine, Benjamin Bratt, Candice Bergen
tomatoConsensus: Though critics say Bullock is funny and charming, she can't overcome a bad script that makes the movie feel too much like a fluffy, unoriginal sitcom.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 7 wins & 5 nominations.
